column4: Every time I try to "sudo apt-get update" I get a "connection timed out" error, but firefox works fine. what is the problem?
its set to ubuntu.com right now, i need to change that?
give me 1 full line of you sources.list
hint us. cahnge us to gb
update is getting caught up on gs.archive.ubuntu.com now
than you might have a dns issue can you ping it?
i can ping us. but not gb.
warning us has alot of times where its down and not up to date use gb or uk if possible
sorry for bugging you again, but this apt-get update isn't working again
